pull.title: [Wallet] FundRawTransaction can accept pre-set inputs whose parent is not yet broadcasted
pull.body:
This PR is based on https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10202, it allows the user to pre fund a transaction with inputs which have not yet been broadcasted.
Please, review and ACK the first one independently from this PR.

This is useful for second layer payment protocol which regularly build transaction on top of unbroadcasted transaction.

events.message: [Wallet] Pass CCoinControl as parameter of CWallet::FundTransaction
[Wallet] Fetch CInputCoins from CWallet before calling FundTransaction
[Wallet] Fetch CInputCoins from CCoinView before calling FundTransaction
[Wallet] FundRawTransaction returns unknown-input error on invalid input
[Wallet] Test FundRawTransaction with inputs from the CoinView
[Wallet] FundRawTransaction can accept pre-set inputs whose parent is not yet broadcasted
[Wallet] Test FundRawTransaction with input from a non existing transaction

events.body: I workedaround this need for this.

> I workedaround this need for this.

@NicolasDorier may I ask what your workaround was?  I was very much hoping to see this PR merged, I'd love to see a workaround.

@JeremyRand I just gave up using the RPC for my projects, getting things merged here is a bit too much effort, it was easier for me to create [NBXplorer](https://github.com/dgarage/NBXplorer/) which is a lightweight block explorer for bitcoin also working on pruned mode.

Feel free to rebase and take this PR if you feel the strength to get it merged, I would review.
